name: io.bytes.per.checksum
relevant log: 1-ERROR	Thread Thread[eventHandlingThread,5,main] threw an Exception.org.apache.hadoop.HadoopIllegalArgumentException: Invalid checksum type: userOpt=null, default=CRC32C:0, effective=null
explanation: The configuration option "io.bytes.per.checksum" is set to 0, which is causing an Invalid checksum type error. This option should be set to a value greater than 0 to ensure proper checksum calculation.

name: dfs.datanode.failed.volumes.tolerated
relevant log: 1-ERROR	Task: attempt_1701312551309_0197_r_000000_0 - exited : org.apache.hadoop.HadoopIllegalArgumentException: Invalid checksum type: userOpt=null, default=CRC32C:0, effective=null
explanation: The configuration option "dfs.datanode.failed.volumes.tolerated" is set to 0, which means no volume failures are tolerated. This could potentially cause the datanode to shutdown upon any volume failure. Consider setting this value to a number greater than 0 to tolerate volume failures.

name: httpfs.buffer.size
relevant log: 1-ERROR	Task: attempt_1701312551309_0197_r_000000_0 - exited : org.apache.hadoop.HadoopIllegalArgumentException: Invalid checksum type: userOpt=null, default=CRC32C:0, effective=null
explanation: The configuration option "httpfs.buffer.size" is set to 4096. This value might be too low for the buffer size, causing issues with the IO stream. Consider increasing this value to improve the performance of the IO stream.
